body.p: Qli Linux Computers offers servers, graphics workstations, laptops, office PCs and even Apple iBook, PowerBook and PowerMac systems with Gentoo Linux pre-installed. Qli Linux Computers donates $20 to this project for every system shipped with Gentoo Linux pre-installed.
body.note: Contact Daniel Robbins if your company sells systems with Gentoo Linux pre-installed.

body.p: Unlike other distributions, Gentoo Linux does not offer an "official" boxed version of Gentoo Linux. Instead, we encourage you to purchase Gentoo Linux from one of the many Linux CD distributors who specialize in producing and selling low-cost CDs. Here is a list of CD distributors that sell Gentoo Linux on CD for a very reasonable price:

North America:
CheapBytes
Tux CDs
ComputerHelperGuy ($1 donation per sale)
Edmunds Enterprises
India:
IndiaInfoTech.org
